item.title: BO - Advanced Parameters - Webservice - Filter sort pagination
item.description: BO - Advanced Parameters - Webservice - Filter sort pagination Details Component : Core Status : IN REVIEW Automated on : 1.7.8.x, 1.7.7.x, 8.0.x, 8.1.x, 9.0.x Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-1176 Steps Step Description Expected result Go to Advanced Parameters >Webservice Webservice page is well displayed the Webservice table is empty = 0 Go to Advanced Parameters >Webservice Webservice page is well displayed
